definition: not to glance sideways (idiom)/to gaze fixedly/to be fully concentrated/to preserve a correct attitude

sentences.english: Objective To study the surgical method and effect of nerve paralysis esotropia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討神經麻痹性內斜視的手術治療方法與效果。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the long term curative effect of surgical treatment for concomitant esotropia of children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討手術矯正小兒共同性內斜視的遠期療效。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects of different surgical procedures of V- exotropia .
sentences.chinese: 目的控討V型斜視不同術式的治療效果。

sentences.english: Strabismus and amblyopia were the commonest eye diseases.
sentences.chinese: 斜視和弱視是腦癱兒童最常見的眼部疾病。

sentences.english: Conclusion The treatment of refractive squint with corneal refractive surgery is a very effective method.
sentences.chinese: 結論角膜屈光手術治療屈光性斜視是一種有效的方法。

sentences.english: Objective To study the morphologic diversity of extraocular muscles with congenital paralytic strabismus.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究先天性麻痹性斜視眼肌的形態學改變。

sentences.english: The little girl dares not to appear in public because she is cross - eyed .
sentences.chinese: 這個小女孩因爲斜視不敢在公共場合露面。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical effect of pleating of extraocular muscle on concomitant squint.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討眼外肌摺疊術治療共同性斜視的臨牀效果。

sentences.english: Severe strabismus leads to double vision and can be treated today by surgery.
sentences.chinese: 嚴重斜視會導致複視，可以依賴當今醫學手術痊癒。

sentences.english: Objective:To study the amount of surgery for concomitant esotropia in children.
sentences.chinese: 研究兒童共同性內斜視手術量。

sentences.english: She looked at him askance and took a forkful of food from his plate.
sentences.chinese: 她斜視着瑞克，從他的餐盤裏取了一勺食物。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the surgical optimal timing and extent for partially accommodative esotropia in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討兒童部分調節性內斜視的手術時機，手術量。

sentences.english: To discussion the opportunity choice on the intermittence exotropia surgery.
sentences.chinese: 探討間歇性外斜視的手術時機。

sentences.english: A squint can sometimes be corrected by an eyepatch.
sentences.chinese: 斜視有時候可以通過戴眼罩來糾正。

sentences.english: Surgical outcomes in convergence insufficiency-type exotropia.
sentences.chinese: 集合功能不全型外斜視的手術治療效果。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the therapeutic effects of strabismus correction by rectus-recession accommodation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討調整性直肌後徙斜視矯正術的治療效果。

definition: to glower (at sb)/to cast an angry look
to like looking attractive (usually of girls)/aestheticism
lit. to drive a lightweight chariot on a familiar road (idiom)/fig. to do sth routinely and with ease/a walk in the park
